    Projects

    Personal projects both completed and in progress!

    Custom Wood Guitars

    Using CNC, hand tools, and electronic components to create custom rare wood guitars.

    Rapid Beverage Chilling

    Exploring Interesting Heat Transfer Techniques for Chilling Coffee Startup

    Peltier Cloud Chamber

    Who doesnâ€™t want to view subatomic particles flying through our atmosphere? A Cloud chamber is a relatively old-school device for subatomic particle viewing.

    Bioactive Crested Gecko Terrarium

    A project primarily focused on providing more natural provisions for my crested geckos and exploring microecosystem design.

    CNN to Lego Construction

    Fueled by my interests in general assembler robotics, this project aims to use convolutional neural nets and controls to assemble 1st grade level legos from an instruction booklet.

    Chaotic Pendulum with Dead Reckoning

    A project designed around modular develop and study of the chaotic movement of a double, triple, or quadruple pendulum.

    Grand Challenges Plastic Insulation

    A project exploring novel uses for microplastic structures.
